Articles.Content: I don't know if someone posted on this subject, I am new to the forums.  So with liquid water being found on Enceladus, it would be cool to see this incorporated in KSP, we could explore the moon (or any moon in KSP that the devs choose to make ice covered) to try and find life. I think it would be a cool content update.

This does sound like a good idea as Ive already a mission to Enceladus planned in the future but until then I am working on this challenge.

Maybe you would like to have a look and possibly try, however welcome to the Forum
